attributes.action: Ask the Her Majesty The Queen to allow Wootton Basset to use the Title Royal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recogonition of Wootton Bassets unstinting loyalty to our fallen service personnel Wootton Basset should be granted the Name Royal Wootton Basset

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
